pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Friday, December 17, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Montréal, Quebec

Private meetings

Media appearances

5:30 p.m.  A year-end interview with the Prime Minister will air on ICI RDI’s En direct avec Patrice Roy.

5:30 p.m.  A year-end interview with the Prime Minister conducted by Pierre Bruneau will air on TVA Nouvelles.
